name: A. Minutes Before the New Year
statement:
New Year is coming and you are excited to know how many minutes remain
before the New Year. You know that currently the clock shows h hours and
m minutes, where 0
le hh < 24 and 0
le mm < 60. Your task is to find the number of minutes before the New
Year. You know that New Year comes when the clock shows 0 hours and 0
minutes.You have to answer t independent test cases.
